lines:
Tri-State College

Accredited

PRESIDENT'S OFFICE

L. M. SNIFF, A.M., PRESIDENT

ANGOLA, INDIANA,

Phillibes ricadences,

ANGOLA, INDIANA, July 22, 1913. 
To the Registras,

Andover, Mars 
Den dici- Enclosed Find a blank Credit sbech 
in which fill the creding Medline C. Lab, 
a Chinese, who attended your lustitubon two

the gears ago. An callen resolen in den 
dired. Thanking you

O Bailey

Secretary
raw: Tri-State College Accredited PRESIDENT'S OFFICE L. M. SNIFF, A.M., PRESIDENT ANGOLA, INDIANA, Phillibes ricadences, ANGOLA, INDIANA, July 22, 1913. To the Registras, Andover, Mars Den diciEnclosed Find a blank Credit sbech in which fill the creding Medline C. Lab, a Chinese, who attended your lustitubon two the gears ago. An callen resolen in den dired. Thanking you O Bailey Secretary

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter enclosing a blank credit sheet in which to fill in the credits of Shin C. Luk.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
